string.text: Anarchists of the Zone ... professing the idea that the Zone is, in fact their own Private Reserve. They believe that all of the laws that exist in the outside world do not apply to them here. Their motto: "Fight all Governmental attempts to take control over the Zone". Sworn enemies against both Duty faction, and all Mercenaries. They have more or less equipped themselves using leftover weapons and armour from Military excursions into the Zone during the former regime under the U.S.S.R.

Adventurers and bandits from all over the World, not shunning any, even the dirtiest work. Their motto: " Money do not smell ". Here artefacts so - smells as greater{big} money... Mercenaries are equipped basically by the western shooting arms.
